Interface ec.id.ECIdentityInterface

Implementing Classes:
ECIdentity
public abstract interface ECIdentityInterface
extends Remote
Interface that defines the ECIdentity remote interface. These two methods define the externally available messaging interfaces for this identity, and are the primary across-process protocol for the P.O. Box capabilities exchange mechanism.

Author:
Scott B. Lewis, slewis@communities.com

Method Summary
void giveCapability(Object capability, Remote receipt)
          Public method called to give the Identity a capability.
void requestCapability(ReachableID id, String req, Object data, Remote receipt)
          Handle a capability request.
 

Method Detail

requestCapability

public void requestCapability(ReachableID id,
                              String req,
                              Object data,
                              Remote receipt)
                      throws RemoteException
Handle a capability request. This is the remotely-exposed interface for others to make capability requests of us. That is, this method is called (via RMI comm system) to make a capability request of this Identity object. All this implementation does is call Identity.requestCapability to actually handle the capability request.
Parameters:
requestor - - the ReachableID for whoever is requesting the capability
requestName - - a string name identifying the type of the request
requestData - - an Object representing any data that goes with this request
receipt - - if we agree to accept the request, we'll give the other identity some capability to continue the interaction. We'll give this capability to their Identity (via giveCapability) and provide them with this receipt. As long as the comm system (whichever one is used) *guarantees* that this object is *passed by reference*, and that such passing by reference is done securely (this is the key to making this pattern secure), then assertions can be made about the security of this whole mechanism.
Throws:
RemoteException - thrown if some RMI messaging problem

giveCapability

public void giveCapability(Object capability,
                           Remote receipt)
                   throws RemoteException
Public method called to give the Identity a capability. See Identity.giveCapability (since all this method does is call that method).
Parameters:
capability - - the capability to be given
receipt - - Object that is the receipt
Throws:
RemoteException - thrown if some problem with sending this message, or some other comm system problem
